title: Mada Minu Haru no Mukaekata
original_name: まだ見ぬ春の迎えかた
sinopse:
Tsuzumi and Mai both like the same guy, but he's currently studying abroad. While he's away, they decide to compete in the culture festival's beauty pageant in order to determine who will have the right to confess to him when he returns.

[Written by Denji]
